channel.title: Golden Wind Smalltown - Town Victory
channel.description:
![image|640x214, 100%](upload://tOiLMceI8eGv3Q3UZlcLzvWrCVG.jpeg) #
[color=gold] JoJo's Bizzare Adventure - Golden Wind Smalltown [/color]
Hosted by @Marluxion and Co-hosted by @Wazza and @katze ### [color=gold] Gameplay & Rules [/color] All Standard FM Rules apply. Find them [Here!](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926) Days will last for 36 hours. Nights will last for 12 hours. Voting is plurality + majority. If majority is reached, the day will end early. Not yeeting is disabled. If the day ends with a tied vote, the yeet will be randomized among the tied. **Post Requirements: You must post at least once within 24 hours of SoD. You must post at least 10 times each day.** ### [color=gold]Smalltown & Special Mechanics[/color] This game is a **Smalltown** game. This means that every role is public knowledge. **Every role each player is assigned is **ALSO** public knowledge!** Alignment is randomized within the roles. This game is also **FLIPLESS**. Alignments will not be publicly revealed on death. Abilities cannot target yourself unless specifically stating that they can. ### [color=gold] Alignments[/color] There will be 10 villagers, 2 mafia and 1 lost wolf. The lost wolf does NOT know who the mafia are, but they do count for parity. The mafia do NOT know who the lost wolf is. Each night the mafia may choose to factional kill one player. This is performable alongside any role actions they might take. The lost wolf does **NOT** inherit the factional once both of the main mafia are dead. Each Alignment's win condition is listed below. > *You are a member of the town! Find and kill all 3 mafia to win!* > *You are a member of mafia! Your partner is [REDACTED]! Achieve parity with the town to win!* > *You are a mafia lost wolf! You do not know your fellow mafia! Achieve parity with the town to win!* ### [color=gold]Players:[/color] 1. Nutella 2. min 3. ~~Chloe~~ - **Killed N2** 4. ~~an_gorta_pratai~~ - **Killed N1** 5. BlueStorm 6. ~~PokemonKidRyan~~ - **Executed D1** 7. ~~Ami~~ ~~Mistyx~~ - **Executed D2** 8. ~~clonedcheese~~ - **Executed D4** 9. DatBird 10. ~~Zone_Q11~~ - **Executed D3** 11. ~~Esooa~~ - **Died N3** 12. EliThePsycho 13. ~~Marshal~~ - **Killed N1** #### [color=gold]Backups[/color] 1. Empoof 2. Whysper 3. WindwardAway #### [color=gold]Spectators[/color] 1. Arete (I) 2. TrustworthyLiberal 3. Astand (I) 4. Jane (U) 5. ATNoName (I) 6. thepigeonnyc (U) 7. Geyde (I) 8. 9. 10. * This setup is strongly inspired by Starship Epiphron and flavored around JoJo's Bizzare Adventure. Shoutout to both of those things! #### [color=gold]Threadmarks[/color] [**EoD1:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/golden-wind-smalltown-night-1-12-13/87268/2411?u=katze) **PokemonKidRyan** executed [**SoD2:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/golden-wind-smalltown-day-2-10-13/87268/2416?u=katze) **Marshal** and **an_gorta_pratai** dead, **Esooa** and **EliThePsycho** swap roles [**EoD2:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/golden-wind-smalltown-night-2-9-13/87268/3456?u=marluxion) **MistyX** executed [**SoD3:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/golden-wind-smalltown-day-3-8-13/87268/3461?u=marluxion) **Chloe** dead [**EoD3:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/golden-wind-smalltown-day-3-8-13/87268/3750?u=katze) **Zone_Q11** executed [**SoD4:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/golden-wind-smalltown-night-3-7-13/87268/3754?u=marluxion) **Esooa** dead [**EoD4:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/golden-wind-smalltown-day-4-6-13/87268/4226?u=katze) **clonedcheese** grated [**SoD5:**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/golden-wind-smalltown-day-5-5-13/87268/4232?u=katze) **Nobody died!** [**Endgame:** ](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/golden-wind-smalltown-town-victory/87268/4252?u=marluxion)**Min** concedes

item.title: Golden Wind Smalltown - Town Victory
item.dc:creator: Arctic
item.description:
i’m just confused as to how someone can get enough enjoyment from the game that they continue playing it despite the lack of investment

where does the satisfaction from a win come from if you had practically no impact on the game

Read full topic

item.title: Golden Wind Smalltown - Town Victory
item.dc:creator: min
item.description:
Look at how everyone posts compared to you just in one day in games

It’s okay to post less, i5s not okay to never post. Idk if ur busy or like not going into thread ever but

Even if 6ou have to set alarms every like what? Few hours? Fm shouldn’t be a chore, but if you’re actively forgetting the thread exists it’s a problem

Read full topic
